They say it's your Birthday

19 May 2006

Well I'm 24 tomorrow and will be spending the day celebrating at a Eurovision song contest party (is this a step up from a BigBrother party?). Anyway, much free booze I hope and some comedy at a flatwarming.

This is what happens when you move back to a place where only your school friends are around. Oh and did I mention 3/4 of my best mates at school now love the cock? That should explain the Eurovision song contest part anyway. It's always weird being in a crowd where you become the minority when the rest of society tends to be the opposite.

Tonight should be good as it's a guy at SQAs leaving night so off to the local weatherspoons.

Joe Wright
Software Cultivationist
